category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 6 (Appointment of Committee Members)
contents: Article 6 (Appointment of Committee Members) â‘  The chairman and members shall be appointed by the chairman, and the vice-chairman shall be elected from among the members, but the appointment of the chairman shall receive the consent of the board of directors. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2021. 12. 27.
